mapper.select: SELECT title, address, phone, openday, opentime, closetime, endtime, tag, content, location FROM recommended_place WHERE postindex = '${postindex}'

SELECT r.tag, r.postindex,r.category, r.content, r.default_lang, r.title, r.date, r.state, c.count, f.filepath AS Thumbnail FROM recommended_place r LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT postindex,COUNT(*) AS count FROM comments GROUP BY postindex)AS c ON r.postindex = c.postindex LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT postindex, filepath FROM recommend_files WHERE (postindex, fileindex) IN (SELECT postindex, MIN(fileindex)AS fileindex FROM recommend_files GROUP BY postindex) ORDER BY fileindex DESC) AS f ON r.postindex = f.postindex
AND (language & ${language}) != 0
AND category = '${category}'
AND state = '${state}'
AND title LIKE '%${titlename}%'
ORDER BY r.postindex DESC
LIMIT ${currentPage},${number}
